channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft PowerPoint
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Microsoft PowerPoint

item.title: CVE-2018-8376|2024-08-05T06:54:36.059Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20powerpoint
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Microsoft PowerPoint software when the software fails to properly handle objects in memory, aka "Microsoft PowerPoint Remote Code Execution Vulnerability." This affects Microsoft PowerPoint.
